aboutUs.title: Our mission
aboutUs.content: Fouly is a young company that helps merchants to better serve their customers. We, as a partner of merchants, promote economic development while empowering merchants to implement secure, modern, data-driven business practices.

team.title: The Team
team.content: Our team is made up of passionate professionals from different backgrounds, a young company that helps merchants to better serve their customers. As a merchant partner, we promote economic development while empowering merchants to implement secure, modern, data-driven business practices.

contact.title: Comment
contact.ideaSuggest: Submit your ideas and / or comments to us. We will be happy to read you and improve Fouly!
contact.commentPlaceHolder: Enter your comments, suggestions or ideas.
contact.findUsSocial: You can find us on social networks. It will be our pleasure to stay connected with you!

delay.title: Is the waiting line moving forward ...

number.title: How many people are there in front of you ?

closed.title: Currently closed
closed.content: Your contribution can only be made while the store is open. Thanks for your interest!

card1.title: Fouly, your personal travel planner
card1.text: Practicing social distancing has become essential for everyone. But some trips cannot be avoided, like going to the grocery store, the pharmacy, etc. Fouly allows you to perfectly plan your trips to these merchants by displaying the current traffic in front of the merchant and therefore, the waiting time. You can thus better plan your trips and avoid the crowds!

card2.title: Why Fouly ?
card2.text: Is there a line to enter the grocery store? Is it a good time to go to the pharmacy? What are the social distancing measures implemented by the merchant? Is it a good time to go into this merchant now? Fouly answers all these questions live!

card3.title: Simple, efficient and always there !
card3.text: Fouly's simple and refined interface makes it quite easy to find your favorite businesses on an interactive map. In addition, you can easily create your own list of favorite businesses, to find these businesses even more easily on your next visit. Finally, leave comments on certain businesses, to give even more information to other Fouly users.

card4.title: Are you ready ?
card4.text: Let Fouly help you plan your trips to your favorite merchants, safely, at your own pace. Easily contribute to keeping other Fouly users informed about the level of traffic in the merchants you visit, and the social distancing measures in place in the business. And do not hesitate to leave us your comments on Fouly, we are listening to you!

myFavorites.title: My favorites
myFavorites.instruction: You will find important details in the blink of an eye such as the waiting time and the traffic in your favorite businesses. To add a favorite, go to the map, select a business and click on the star.

owner.title: Owners and managers
owner.content: Avec les nouvelles règles de distanciation sociale à mettre en place, les écueils rencontrés par les commerçants dans les mois à venir seront nombreux et à différents niveaux. Ces nouvelles règles imposent souvent des changements importants au niveau organisationnel pour les commerçants, en plus d’ajouter des contraintes à la clientèle, ce qui est toujours un défi à relever. Un de ces défis consiste à permettre à la clientèle d’être servie sans attente, de manière sécuritaire en respectant les règles de distanciation.

measures.title: Distanciation measures
measures.content:
• Maintain a distance of at least 2 meters with other customers and staff
  • Wash hands before entering the store (or follow employee instructions)
  • Follow the instructions at checkout to pay for your items
  • Do not go to the store if you have symptoms
  • Limit handling of items as much as possible
  • Pay by credit or debit card
measures.na: This functionality will be available soon. Thanks for your interest in Fouly!
